name: Mastering the Art of React Overengineering
description: Learn to turn simple tasks into complex React architectures.

lessons.name: Introduction to Unnecessary State Management
lessons.description: Explore how to use Redux for a single toggle button.

lessons.name: Advanced Component Splitting Techniques
lessons.description: Break a 'Hello World' app into 50 reusable components.

lessons.name: Mastering Prop Drilling to the Earth's Core
lessons.description: Learn to pass props through 100 levels of components.

name: The Science of Microsleep
description: Optimize your sleep to the millisecond for maximum productivity.

lessons.name: Blink Patterns for Subconscious Learning
lessons.description: Master the art of absorbing information while blinking.

lessons.name: Advanced Caffeine Alchemy
lessons.description: Transform your bloodstream into a coffee reservoir.

lessons.name: Dream Debugging: Fix Bugs in Your Sleep
lessons.description: Learn to solve coding problems while snoring.

name: Practical Sleep Evasion Techniques
description: Hands-on practice in avoiding sleep at all costs.

lessons.name: The Art of Eye Propping
lessons.description: Master the use of toothpicks and duct tape to keep your eyes open.

lessons.name: Lecture Hall Camouflage
lessons.description: Learn to blend in with your surroundings while unconscious.

lessons.name: Snore Harmonization
lessons.description: Synchronize your snores with the professor's speech patterns.

name: Gourmet Microwave Cuisine
description: Elevate your microwave skills from 'reheating' to 'fine dining'.

lessons.name: The Art of Nuking: Beyond Popcorn
lessons.description: Discover how to prepare a banquet frozen dinner using only a microwave.

lessons.name: From Vending Machine To Table
lessons.description: Prepare a feast using only the snacks from the office vending machine.

lessons.name: Group Project: Water Boiling Simulation
lessons.description: Use an online simulator to practice boiling water for coffee.

name: Extreme Culinary Improvisation
description: Push the boundaries of what can be considered 'cooking'.

lessons.name: Dorm Room Sushi Rolling
lessons.description: Create sushi rolls using fruit roll-ups and gummy worms.

lessons.name: Radiator Grilling Techniques
lessons.description: Harness the power of your room's radiator for grilling perfection.

lessons.name: Laptop Heat Cooking
lessons.description: Utilizing your overheating laptop as a portable stovetop.

name: Advanced AI Dependency
description: Outsource your entire job to ChatGPT without getting caught.

lessons.name: Prompt Engineering for Plausible Deniability
lessons.description: Craft prompts that make AI-generated work look like your own.

lessons.name: Strategic Typo Insertion
lessons.description: Learn to add just enough errors to fool plagiarism detectors.

lessons.name: AI-Generated Excuses for Missed Deadlines
lessons.description: Utilize ChatGPT to create believable excuses for late work.

name: The Art of Code Obfuscation
description: Make your code as incomprehensible as possible, even to yourself.

lessons.name: Variable Naming: The Cryptic Approach
lessons.description: Master the art of using 'a', 'aasdfaf', 'my_var' as variable names.

lessons.name: Crafting Effective Comments
lessons.description: Learn to write suicidal comments in your code to hope the TA's take pity on you

lessons.name: Spaghetti Code Masterclass
lessons.description: Write code that doesn't work.

name: Full Stack Plumbing
description: Become a master of both digital and physical pipes.

lessons.name: TCP/IP: Toilet Clog Protocol/Instant Plunging
lessons.description: Apply networking principles to unclog your toilet.

lessons.name: Fixing Faucets to Home Depot Memberships
lessons.description: Buy the cheapest materials at the right places to fix your leaks

lessons.name: Load Balancing: Distributing Water Pressure
lessons.description: Optimize your home's water distribution using server load balancing principles.
